# The `AddressSanitizerPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Public interface to the address sanitizer module pass for instrumenting code to check for various memory errors. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Public interface to the address sanitizer module pass for instrumenting code to check for various memory errors.

This adds &#39;asan.module&#95;ctor&#39; to &#39;llvm.global&#95;ctors&#39;. This pass may also run intependently of the function address sanitizer.

Definition at line 39 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/instrumentation/addresssanitizer-h">AddressSanitizer.h</a>.
